title: Demmitt StL- beginning of dismantling the monster FS
author: iowadoc77

posts.post_title: Demmitt StL- beginning of dismantling the monster FS
posts.post_content:
This is the beginning of dismantling my monster.  Tough decision, but going in a different direction collecting wise.  Lots of cards to come, but starting here

Demmitt StL variation $1100 paypal F and F shipped and insured.  First to say I'll take it here wins over ongoing negotiations or pms

Contact me with any questions.  Thanks for looking.  Eric

Not the prettiest but the parts that count look good

[IMG][URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/k8esmn9i][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/k8esmn9i.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/IMG]

[IMG][URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/362wrjgh][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/362wrjgh.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/IMG]

[IMG][URL=https://sportscardalbum.com/card/j3408343][IMG]https://sportscardalbum.com/c/j3408343.jpg[/IMG][/URL][/IMG]

I will take it - 
Also - Pm'ed you about my needs for my monster.

I'm about a third of the way through building a set of SGC cards graded between 30 and 50.  Any list you might have would be appreciated.

Marty

Thanks to everyone for the overwhelming response. Guess I should have priced him a bit higher :D.  I will be listing more cards but I have about 30 PMs to respond to. I have a really crazy week so it may be the weekend before I get them all answered. 
I appreciate the patience
Eric

I would be very interested in a listing of any cards from the T206 set in PSA 4 or above, along with prices.

Thanks,

Bill
